Selected Answer: A
A. the enterprise's actionable strategy.

Within the COBIT goals cascade, stakeholder drivers are transformed into the enterprise's actionable strategy. Stakeholder drivers are analyzed and translated into strategic objectives and goals that the enterprise can work toward achieving. These objectives and goals then guide the development of the enterprise's actionable strategy, which includes specific actions and plans to achieve those objectives and goals.
